name: Landeed
headline: Landeed is India's fastest property title search engine
description: Landeed is building India's (then for rest of the world)  fastest and most comprehensive property title search engine. More than 84% of Indian household wealth is stored in real estate, property and land. However, with 2/3rds of all court cases in India dealing with land-related disputes, it is essential that people have accessible public records to both protect themselves against litigation and provide appropriate documentation for facilitating transactions.

founders.name: Sanjay Mandava, Founder
founders.description: 2x YC founder. First time with GoLorry and now Landeed. Before startups, I worked as proprietary trader/investment analyst at Knight Vinke (Activist Hedge Fund) and as a real estate developer. Currently, I am CEO and Founder of Landeed with focus on building India's (later for the developing world) fastest and most comprehensive property title search engine.

founders.name: ZJ Lin, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CPO of GoLorry (YC W16): 2015 - 2022
Co-founder and CPO of Landeed (YC W22): 2022 - present

### Landeed: Revolutionizing Property Title Search in India

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's S22 batch, Landeed is blazing a trail as India's fastest property title search engine. Based in Hyderabad and boasting a team of 35 dedicated professionals, Landeed is addressing a major pain point: the pervasive land-related disputes in India, where two-thirds of court cases revolve around property issues.

**Mission and Vision**  
Landeed's mission is straight to the point: making property title searches fast, efficient, and accessible. In a country where over 84% of household wealth is tied up in real estate, having reliable access to property records is not just useful; it's essential for protecting individuals from litigation and ensuring smooth transactions.

**Key Offerings**  
Landeed provides a robust platform for various stakeholders in the property market, including developers, banks, lawyers, and individuals looking to manage their real estate documents. Hereâ€™s a glimpse of their offerings:

- **For Developers**: Seamless registration processes with comprehensive support for paperwork.
- **For Banks**: AI-driven solutions to speed up loan approvals and enhance regulatory compliance.
- **For Legal Professionals**: Simplified legal agreements and registration processes.
- **For Individuals**: Efficient management of property documents through their integration, LEX.

**Funding and Growth**  
Recently, Landeed raised $5 million in a Series X funding round to enhance its AI and machine learning capabilities through Landeed Labs. This investment is set to solidify its position as a leader in property tech within India.

**User Engagement**  
The platform is user-friendly, featuring over 50 lakh successful searches across 20+ states. Customers can find over 100 types of documents, from encumbrance certificates to sale deeds, all vetted against the latest government records.

**Why It Matters**  
With digital resources like Landeed, navigating property ownership and legal parameters becomes less daunting, fostering a more informed society. The company stands on the frontlines of a sector pivotal to economic stability in India, balancing innovation with customer need.

**Conclusion**  
For anyone looking to manage property in India efficiently, Landeed is a vital ally. They are not just a tech company; they are making significant strides in transforming how property transactions are handled, ensuring resources are at the fingertips of users. Check out Landeed [here](https://www.landeed.com/) to learn more and get started with your property documents!
